item.description:
Ok here's the planned route. Looks like Route 1 the whole way then a bit of 114 then 1 the way back again.

Route

Any adjustment needed?

Hold on, I've been informed of a few things so I'm going to change/add some things

I would say the minimum cc's for this would be 125cc.
I plan to make this 0% highway.
Average Speed may be 30-50mph
We won't get lost because I have my GPS
I am finding the best route available for this. But I've probably never personally been on the route though since I've never been down there.
Only been to Providence and Warwick but by highway.

Let's go to Java Speed Scooters in Providence, RI
It's a scoot dealer / coffee place.
I've never been there myself though So I don't know what else to say.
It's first on the way down because it's closer to us.

Erik has told me that Twisted Throttle is having an open house that day too. They are located in Kingston RI
I've never been there either but I've bought stuff online from them. It's a place with alot, if not all motorcycle/scoot accessories
Then go south a bit more to Kingston

And then after that Eastward towards Middletown, RI to Vespa Newport.

Then loop our way home
item.name: Rhode Island Scooting
